title: Story to Manga
subtitle: Transform your stories into beautiful manga panels with AI
description: Create stunning manga-style artwork from your written stories using advanced AI technology. Perfect for storytellers, artists, and manga enthusiasts.

storyInput.label: Your Story
storyInput.placeholder: Enter your story here... Describe characters, setting, and plot.

characterRefs.label: Character References
characterRefs.description: Upload images to help AI understand your characters

status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

description.auto: Automatically select the best model based on language
description.nanobanana: Google's Gemini Flash Image model, optimized for English content and better character consistency
description.volcengine: VolcEngine's Doubao Seedream 4.0, optimized for Chinese content and supports reference images

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.apiError: API error. Please try again later.
errors.fileTooLarge: File size too large. Please upload a smaller image.

createFirstProject: Create your first project to get started
confirmDeleteProject: Are you sure you want to delete project '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
editPromptPlaceholder: Modify the prompt to regenerate the image...
redrawDescription: Modify the prompt and regenerate, or keep it the same for a direct redraw
modificationPlaceholder: Describe the changes you want to make to the image...
modifyDescription: Use the original image as reference and generate a new image based on modification instructions
imageSizeDescription: Choose uniform size for all images in this project
